title-part.text: PRELIMINARY TREATMENT OF FIBRES, e.g. FOR SPINNING

reference.text: winding or unwinding, conducting or guiding laps, webs, slivers or rovings in general, sliver or roving cans, depositing in sliver or roving cabs B65H; preparation of fibres for paper-making D21

note.note-paragraph: Attention is drawn to the note following the title of Class D01.

title-part.text: Severing continuous filaments or long fibres, e.g. stapling
to form staple fibres not delivered in strand form
Converting tows to slivers or yarns, e.g. in direct spinning

reference.text: drafting arrangements, twisting arrangements D01H

obtained by electric or electro-static means

title-part.text: by agitation within a moving receptacle
by means of air draught arrangements

title-part.text: Combinations of opening or cleaning machines

reference.text: fibre-feeding apparatus of general application in fibre-treating machines D01G23/00

title-part.text: Disintegrating fibre-containing articles to obtain fibres for re-use
Opening, unravelling, or teasing ropes or like fibrous strands to obtain fibres for re-use
Opening rags to obtain fibres for re-use

reference.text: mechanical treatment of rags for paper-making D21B
mixing of fibres combined with other operations, e.g. bale-breaking of fibre-opening, see appropriate groups for such operations

with flats or like members or endless card sheets operating in association with a main cylinder
with other apparatus, e.g. drafting devices, in integral or closely-associated combination

Arrangements for adjusting relative positions of carding elements
for use during the grinding of card clothing

Attaching card clothing to carding elements

reference.text: D01G1/06, D01G9/12, D01G15/46, D01G15/94 take precedence
D01G21/00 takes precedence; intermediate feeds in carding machines D01G15/40

title-part.text: with means for regulating rate of feed
Arrangements in which a machine or apparatus is regulated in response to changes in the volume or weight of fibres fed, e.g. piano motions

reference.text: arrangements in which draft is regulated in response to irregularities in fibre supply D01H

Lap-forming devices not integral with machines specified above

with lap-roll or the like loaded to provide firm packages
with automatic discharge of lap-roll or the like
